Name: Isiah Thomas
Note: Wore No. 42 for one playoff game in 1985 (due to his jersey stolen).

Name: Wilt Chamberlain
Note: Team was in Philadelphia through 1959–1962 and in San Francisco through 1962–1965.

Name: Tom Meschery
Note: Team was in Philadelphia through 1961–1962 and San Francisco through 1962–1971.

Name: Chris Mullin
Note: Also served as Executive Vice President of Basketball Operations (2004-2009).

Name: Nate Thurmond
Note: Team bore the San Francisco name through 1963–1971 before adopting the Golden State name starting with the 1971–72 season.

Name: Carroll Dawson
Note: As assistant coach (1980–1995) and general manager (1995–2007).
